column2: (A yacht silently moves southbound through the Atlantic Ocean. The sun beams bright with no clouds in sight. The murky sea appears calm.)
Have you figured out where were headed?
I dont knowZXZ I just want to travel and take photos . . . I just want to be away from home.
That topic came up againZXZ huh?
YeahZXZ but this time hes serious about it. He even flew out from New York to visit me hereZXZ in Miami!
No way?! But whats so bad about accepting his offer anyways? You would have what everyone would kill for.
I already have all I could possibly want. If I go backZXZ Ill lose everything.
YeahZXZ I guess youre right. Loss of freedom for you would mean living without a lifeZXZ huh?
Right . . . a life not worth living.
You know what would be a good idea?! Lets go visit the Caribbeans!
Huh . . . thats random but Ill go tell the Captain.
Choosing the Engine Room
The engine room is locked. I guess Ill head back . . .
Choosing the Cabin
Joe is looking out the window.
Choosing Captains Quarters
Robert looks very focused on his steering wheel . . .
(A bright clear day with calm seas.)
Joe looks like hes enjoying the sea. Weather looks pretty good today . . . I hope it will stay like this for us to get to the Caribbeans safely.
Robert mustve locked the door. I probably should check out other places. Theres nothing for me to do here anyways.
I had good sleep last night. The days too young to go back to sleep.
Hey Cap.
Looks like the weather is doing us a favor todayZXZ huh?
(scoffs) Youd be a fool for underestimating the sea.
(Be nice)
WellZXZ thats why youre gonna make sure we get to the Carribeans safely right?
SoZXZ ummm . . . what made you a man of the sea?
Im going down to the engine room to make sure the ships engine is running how its supposed to.
(Be rude)
What do you think Im hiring YOU for then? You should do your job and save the attitude so I can have a good time on this trip OK?
Arent you gonna say something?
Im going to the engine room to make sure the ships engine is working. Arent you here to take photos?
(The weather is cloudy and the sky grey. Creaking sounds can be heard throughout the boat with thunder rumbling in the sky.)
The Captains not in here right now. Bathroom break maybe?
I probably shouldnt stay out here. Seems like its about to rain soon.
Joe is intensely gazing out the window. I probably shouldnt bother him right now.
(Captain and Gary seem to be working on something. Gary seems a bit annoyed whereas Robert looks expressionless)
(becomes aggitated after MC enters) Why did you come down here??
The ship stopped so I went to look for you in your quartersZXZ but no one answered so I came here. AlsoZXZ who is this?
The guy fixing your damned engine!
WellZXZ I was not informed about this. RobZXZ who is he? I thought my friend and I are the only one on board.
You thought wrong didnt ya? NowZXZ if you could do us a favor and leave so I can fix this damn part! Sound okay?
(Refuse and stay)
Do you even know who I am?? How dare you talk to me like that! Robert? Say something!
KidZXZ a storm is coming and hes the only shot we got at making this ship move. Go back to your cabin.
The Captain said it. Now pleaseZXZ leave.
(turns mad) RobertZXZ lets have a talk when you get back up to deck.
(Obey and leave)
(sigh) If this is what it has come to . . . me needing a stowaway to fix the ship.
Why does that matter? Just know that Im here now helping YOU out.
I hate to admit itZXZ but right now I need this mans help to make it to the Caribbeans. We can worry about this mans origin later.
(Pouring rain and the sound of thunder rumbling can be heard.)
Why did I come out in the pouring rain? Itd be bad to get sick now.
Seems like the Captain has locked the door again. I cant believe we have a stowaway! I should go see what the Captain has to say about this engine guy.
(The Captain seems very nervous as he tries to stay in control of the boat.)
HEY CAP!
ROBERT!
(turns around) ARE YOU OUT OF YOUR MIND?! GET BACK TO YOUR CABIN NOW!
(Stay)
Hey! Im not gonna just sit here not knowing if we can make it out of this or not!
Theres no point arguing with you . . . Just keep your eyes open for anything that can harm the ship.
And you better have a firm hold of that steering wheel. Youve got 3 lives on your hands. I dont want to die in the middle of nowhere!
Four. There are four people on this ship.
Right . . . well . . . we still have to talk about that after we get out of this.
IF. If we get out of this . . .
(Go back)
OkayZXZ not that Im afraid or anything . . . Also keep in mindZXZ that 3 lives are in your hands . . . in-including your ownZXZ okay?!
Four. There are four people on this ship.
I dont care. You be-better make sure me and my friend get out of this safely.
Wish yourself some luck then.
(Got through the stormZXZ but the cloudy sky remains. On the other handZXZ the radio and navigation system are now dysfunctional.)
Joe remains intensely staring out the window
I dont want to see that stowaway guy right now.
Im glad that we made it out of the storm.
YeahZXZ me too manZXZ me too.
Are you still sure about this? Running from your dad I mean.
YeahZXZ I dont want to be forced to live a life I dont want.
But dont you miss your home? In New York with your parentsZXZ enjoying a comfortable and lavish lifestyle?
NahZXZ never felt like a home anyway. Doing photography is so much more than being held down by that boring company.
It cant be all that bad. Surely better than dying at sea.
(Be a jerk)
What are you even talking about? You agreed to comeZXZ dont start with me. You thought I knew itd be like this?
Chill out dude...forget that I even said anything.
(Be depressing)
Maybe youre right...I should probably go check with Robert to see if the ship is in good shape.
Yeah thats a good idea.
Damn it! I thought Id be dead. Hows the ship looking?
The storm damaged the ship. With what little materials and tools we haveZXZ the damage is irreparable.
Are you serious? How bad is it?
The navigation system has been destroyed due to the heavy rain and lightning.
WaitZXZ what are you saying?
Im saying that we cannot use the GPS like before.
What?! Youve got to be kidding! I dont want to be stranded at sea! Figure it outZXZ CAPTAIN!
Calm downZXZ were still breathing. ButZXZ youd want to consider either going back or pushing forward to one of the Caribbean islands to restock our food supply. Were running out.
(Turn Back)
What are our chances if we keep going?
The sea can be too unpredictable. I cannot give you my assurance.
Some things arent worth dying forZXZ right?
Lets go back.
(Keep going and ration food)
Listen to yourself. You think Im the kind of person to just give up midway? No way were going backZXZ NO WAY!
Fair enough. But we wont be at the nearest island until tomorrow. How do you want to ration the food?
(Keep food for yourself and give the other half to the Captain)
Well Im going to be taking oneZXZ and since youre the CaptainZXZ you should eat.
Fair enough.
(Keep food for yourself and give the other half to Joe)
What do you mean how am I going to ration the food? Of course my buddy Joe and I will have to eat!
(The crew arrives at a sunny island in search of food and fuel.)
See? I told you weve got good luck. The sea is no place for me to die.
YeahZXZ yeah. Lets get something to eatZXZ yeah? Im starving here!
I will get us food and fuel. You can take a look around if you wishZXZ but do not go far. Meet back here at 12PM.
You do what you gotta do Captain. Im gonna go and take some photos around here.
I was talking to Joe. MichaelZXZ you take care of the ship while Im away.
WaitZXZ what? Why would I do that? Im finally in the Caribbeans. I want to take pictures!
Trust meZXZ you dont want Gary to mess around on board the ship. I need someone to keep an eye on him for me.
Gary? Are you talking about the guy in the engine room?
Yes.
Why dont you take him with you then?
What guy in the engine room? What are you guys talking about?
I dont trust him but we need him for the ship in case anything breaks again.
For real? What is up with this guy? Is he like your prisoner?
If hes going to be a stowaway on my shipZXZ least he could do is work for his spot.
(Watch over Gary to make sure he doesnt run away)
UghZXZ fine. Ill go check on Gary and see what he has to say for himself. I am still VERY curious about how he ended up on MY yacht.
Im going to get us some fuel now.
(Disregard Rob and take pictures around the island)
ManZXZ youre worrying too much. Where could he possibly go? Im not going to waste my chance with this beautiful scenery.
(MC and Joe leave the sceneZXZ Robert gets half the resources and rushes back to the boat with Gary still locked inside the engine room.)
Hey Gary!
Old dude told you my nameZXZ huh? What do you want?! Why are we stopping?!
Im just surprised youre still alive. You knowZXZ for someone who is not even supposed to be on MY yacht.
(scoffs) Thats what you think. I assume you still havent had that conversation you wanted with our old friend up there yet?
No need for that now. You are going to tell me why youre hiding on MY yacht.
Not until you tell me where we are.
Fine. We are at a Caribbean island. Im wasting my damn time figuring out what is up with you! Start talking.
Or what? Youre going to shoot me?
Thats not funny. WaitZXZ what are you- !
(Gary rushes toward MC but missesZXZ he then runs towards the doorZXZ only to be pushed back inside with the CaptainZXZ who enters the room.)
WHAT THE HELL IS UP WITH HIM?! I want you to explain this situation now!
Ill explain later. NowZXZ (turns toward Gary) it would be in your best interest to not jump ship now. Im sure you know why.
So this is how you treat your lifesaverZXZ huh?
Michael. Get back up there now and I will explain later.
But . . .
NOW!
SoZXZ youre gonna tell him? That his precious little yacht has a murderer on board?
Youre not.
DONT YOU DARE TRY TO PATRONIZE ME! You wanna say something like thatZXZ go tell my family! See if they believe you!
Im gonna leave you here to calm down a bit...heres a sandwich. You should eat and get some rest.
Its too early to turn in for bed. Lets go check on how the Captain is doing.
I dont want to talk to Gary right nowZXZ hell only worsen my mood.
Seems like the Captain is not in his room. I wonder where he went...
Didnt expect to find you here.
I...todays the anniversary of my sons death.
Wow...um...Im sorry. How...how did he die?
Im sorry. I shouldnt have asked that. Its not my place to question you.
No its okay. Its been a long time already...He died of cancer.
Is this why youre so far from home?
Far from home? (chuckles sadly) I dont even remember what that place looks like anymore.
Dont you ever think about going back?
Trust meZXZ I do every single day. But what would that change? NowZXZ here I am. 18 years on this ship feel more like home than any other place.
Youre saying...home does not necessarily have to be a physical place?
Why would it be restricted to only physical places? You seeZXZ it is never about where you areZXZ but about how you feel when you are there.
Ive...never thought about home in that sense...
Trust meZXZ I definitely didnt have these thoughts in mind when I was your age either. Im sure youve got some questionsZXZ right?
(Ask about Gary)
YeahZXZ about Gary.
Im sure youve heard of a Gary WongZXZ am I correct?
Gary Wong? WaitZXZ no way! Youre talking about Gary Wong from the news who murdered his entire family 15 years ago?!
Yes. Before you panicZXZ I want you to know that whatever youve heard about him beforeZXZ from news or gossipZXZ its all wrong.
What do you mean its all wrong? There was evidence proving him guilty! Whats wrong with you?! Are you protecting him?!
I called the police.
What?
The family. I was a friend of theirs. That OctoberZXZ I was on my way to visit themZXZ only to see a Caucasian male rushing out the front door of the house.
I found them thereZXZ still sitting on that couchZXZ just never waking up again . . .
Im...Im sorry about your friends . . .
Couldnt believe my eyesZXZ you know? Then the police started looking for some guy called Gary Wong. Way shorter than the guy I sawZXZ and skinnier too.
So how did he end up here? GaryZXZ I mean.
Im sure you saw news about him getting arrested. Poor guy came out of jail two years agoZXZ only to find his wife and kids living with another man.
They didnt . . .
Right. They didnt believe what he had to say and left him . So he started stealing and robbingZXZ always on the run and broke into here.
This is why...he acted aggressively and wanted to leave.
Exactly. AnywaysZXZ youve got your answers. The navigation system was fixed and we can start sailing tomorrow.
. . . YeahZXZ sounds good to me.
NowZXZ let us all get some rest.
(Rest)
Im feeling a bit tired now. I think Ill go to bed now.
Fair enough. AlsoZXZ I was able to fix the navigation system todayZXZ so tomorrow we can set sail safely.
Fantastic. I was worried if wed be able to get going anytime soon.
No need to worry. NowZXZ try and get some rest.
(The journey is coming to an end as we are only hours away from Florida.)
The door is locked. Sounds of the engine running could be heard from the outside.
Hey there. I just want to thank you for taking me on this trip. Its been very meaningful in ways that I did not expect it to be.
Youre welcome. You knowZXZ I wish I couldve learned as much as you had when I was your age.
WellZXZ our experiences make us who we are todayZXZ right? Cant go back anyways.
SoZXZ how you feeling Mike? Are you happy with what you got from this trip?
I think Im feeling better with my decision. HonestlyZXZ I was anxious about this trip. Thanks for coming with me Joe.
Thats what bros are for man. PlusZXZ I got to experience places I never expected to ever visit in my life!
It feels liberating doesnt it?
Yeah it does. Im starting to miss my home though. Nothing comes close to my moms home cooked dinner.
Yeah...I wish I could say the same. On the flip sideZXZ I think I can get used to living like this.
What do you mean by that?
You knowZXZ being free and living without any expectations of you. Free from worry.
I dont know if I consider that MY lifestyle manZXZ but whatever works for you. Im glad you found your happiness.
YeahZXZ I think Ive found something precious that I did not expect to.
Have you decided on the course of this journey?
(Settle down somewhere)
Im seeing an end to this adventure. I want to take photos of the oceans and spread awareness of how destructive we are to the sea.
Young manZXZ Im glad you found a different and more fulfilling path for your life.
What do you mean?
NothingZXZ its just some old mans ramble.
(Keep journeying with the Captain)
Yeah. I want to keep journeying with you on this ship. I love exploring the ocean and seeing new sights. This gives me a great opportunity for me to pursue my passion for photography too!
Im glad you chose to follow the same footsteps. Im sure you wont regret this decisionZXZ I give you my word.
WellZXZ I can always leave even if it comes down to that.
Ill have to get used to the sound of silence again if that were to happen (sigh). Im happy that Im no longer alone.
And Im happy I finally found somewhere I can call my home.
After deciding to turn backZXZ Michael returns to New York to work beneath his father. His daily mundane workstyle makes him more unmotivated each dayZXZ
slowly losing his creative spark. He physically returns to a place called home but feels far from it. . .
After deciding to settle down at the Caribbean in small straw bungalowZXZ Michael consistently continues to take breathtaking photographs in the Caribbean environment.
He hides behind the veil of anonymity as he posts his work and creation for others to see. Each support he gets reminds him that hes on the right path.
HoweverZXZ he has no one to share his photographs with given that he is isolated from his fatherZXZ his crewmatesZXZ and the rest of society. . .
After deciding to keep journeying with the CaptainZXZ Michael pursues his passion of photography surrounded by the people he has come to knowZXZ
taking advantage of the ever-changing scenery the sea life has to offer. . .
